text: Hello. Could someone please let me know how to set an enrolment trigger when an object is created? E.g. when a new contact is added

Hi all, trying to “lazy load” my chatbot by activating the bot when i click a custom button. and this is working so far, but what i can’t seem to find is if the chatbot is turned on or off using the availability option in HubSpot.

Here is what i have done so far: using the HubSpotconversations sdk i’ve taken care of the fact that my bot doesn’t load on the page load, but only when i click a custom button, if there is no active conversation in the chatbot. so far so good. but now: if there is a chatbot, but the availability is off like the image i’ve added, i don’t want to preload my custom button that fires the chatbot.

so my question: is there a status or function or whatever in the sdk that shows me if the chatbot is hidden (see image)
